br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization

Interface XMLSerialization

  • All Superinterfaces:
    NoRootSerialization, Serialization, View
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    XStreamXMLSerialization

    public interface XMLSerialization
extends Serialization
    Basic xml serialization support using a xml BasicSerializer.
    Version:
    3.0.2
    Author:
    guilherme silveira

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String ENVIRONMENT_INDENTED_KEY
      Key used to search via environment if XML will be printed with indentation or not.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      XMLSerialization indented()
      This option adds indentation to output XML.

      • Methods inherited from interface br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.Serialization

        accepts, from

      • Methods inherited from interface br.com.caelum.vraptor.serialization.NoRootSerialization

        from

    • Field Detail

      • ENVIRONMENT_INDENTED_KEY

        static final String ENVIRONMENT_INDENTED_KEY
        Key used to search via environment if XML will be printed with indentation or not. Indentation via code have more priority than via properties.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • indented

        XMLSerialization indented()
        This option adds indentation to output XML. If the key ENVIRONMENT_INDENTED_KEY is found in environment, the value will evaluated.
